message.content:
{"id": "20249", 
 "title": "Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help", 
 "description": "Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help", 
 "OB": "When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 should display help. However, the help window closes immediately, preventing the user from reading its contents.", 
 "EB": "The help window should remain open after pressing F1 in the change editor menu, allowing the user to read the help contents.", 
 "SR": ""}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '20249', 'title': 'Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help', 'description': 'Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help ', 'OB': 'Build F2When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 will display some help.However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read.If there is supposed to be F1 defined for the change editor menu, then the helpwindow should stay open for the user to read. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
